plays.text: Penalty to Craig Adams 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brendan Morrison
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Craig Adams
Penalty to Daniel Sedin 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Rod Brind'Amour
Goal scored by Trevor Linden assisted by Brent Sopel and Mats Lindgren
Penalty to Markus Naslund 2 minutes for Roughing Erik Cole
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Roughing Markus Naslund
Goal scored by Bret Hedican assisted by Jan Hlavac and Ron Francis
Penalty to Bret Hedican 2 minutes for Interference Matt Cooke
Goal scored by Ed Jovanovski assisted by Markus Naslund
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Holding Sean Hill
Goal scored by Rod Brind'Amour assisted by Jeff O'Neill and Bret Hedican
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Tripping Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Holding Brendan Morrison
Penalty to Jaroslav Svoboda 2 minutes for Holding Sami Salo
Penalty to Ed Jovanovski 2 minutes for Hooking Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Matt Cooke 2 minutes for Tripping Jan Hlavac
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Holding Todd Bertuzzi
Goal scored by Daniel Sedin assisted by Brent Sopel
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for High Sticking Brent Sopel
Penalty to Mattias Ohlund 2 minutes for Elbowing Sean Hill
